oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special orders for Lt. John Lafayette Lemonds to be assigned light duty
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Orders for 1st Lt. John Lafayette Lemonds, Co. I, 5th Tenn. Inf., CSA, to be assigned to light duty according to Special Order No. 22. Col. J. W. Colquitt assigned him to duty as adjutant of the post. He had been wounded in the arm during the 1864 Atlanta campaign. (See previous letters henr001-006, 016.)
